title: New: Happa – Freak
body:
Like most sites, we’re playing catch up after the Christmas break.

This new cut from Leeds wonderkid **[Happa](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18715-video-vondelpark-dracula-happa-remix/ "Video: Vondelpark – Dracula (Happa Remix)")**, is perhaps my highlight. _Freak_, is a spine-rumbling odyssey, a soundtrack to darkness or a rattling display of madness. Or it could just be a killer house tune. You decide.
